Description.Name: Demon
Description.Details: This ComStar based variant carries an Improved Heavy Gauss Rifle and five tons of ammunition. A Medium Laser is mounted on each side in a Sponson Turret. For covering the rear, the CX-2 carries four Mine Dispensers on the rear hull. This refit is thought to be a prototype, as the Improved Heavy Gauss Rifle is carried in a fixed forward mounting, leaving the turret empty. The main turret of the original Demon was left in place. The Demon was originally created by the SLDF as its standard fighting vehicle in 2716. A match for any light or medium BattleMech, the Demon had good maneuverability and was protected by ten tons of slab armor, most of it concentrated in its front. Due to the nature of its powerful main weapon the Demon was often used in ambush attacks and fought in pairs instead of the usual four-vehicle lance. The vehicle's main disadvantage was its lack of speed, which made it vulnerable to faster 'Mechs and other vehicles able to maneuver around and engage its weaker rear armor. Fusion: Expensive engine that works in a Vacuum. Movement: 4/6 Hex: 120/180 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 270 30 Left 160 30 Right 160 30 Rear 100 30 Turret 170 30 Total 860 150

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
